Mesh¶

class +AMrotorSIM.+Rotor.+FEMRotor.@Mesh.Mesh(optn)¶

Bases: sphinxcontrib.mat_types.handle

Mesh Class of the mesh, which includes the nodes and elements

name = None¶

minimum allowed element length

d_max = None¶

maximum allowed element length

n_refinement = None¶

no of refinement steps, when looking for the optimal element length

approximation = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.Rotor.FEMRotor.MeshNode

nodes = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.Rotor.FEMRotor.Element.TimoshenkoLinearElement

+AMrotorSIM.+Rotor.+FEMRotor.@Mesh.show_2D(self, varargin)¶

plot the distribution of elements in 2D

+AMrotorSIM.+Rotor.+FEMRotor.@Mesh.show_2D_nodes(self, varargin)¶

Plot the mesh nodes in 2D

+AMrotorSIM.+Rotor.+FEMRotor.@Mesh.show_3D(self, ax, color)¶
